H0.text: A sports player scoring a goal is measuring a change, as people use many tools to help measure changes.

H1.text: A scientist who gives a weather report is the person measuring a change, using many tools to help measure changes.

H2.text: A friend watches a television show is the person measuring a change, as people use many tools to help measure changes.

H3.text: A nurse checking the temperature of a patient is measuring a change, illustrating that people use many tools to help measure changes.

A4.text: Nurses assess patients' physical and mental health.

A5.text: Nurses also assess a patient's response to medication or other treatments, such as physical activity and blood transfusions.
